author: Salvatore Calabrese
description: Well balanced with a rich blackberry flavour.
name: Godfrey
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE blackberries in base if shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice
